title: Diplomats
body: The following Madeirans pursued a career in diplomacy and served as representatives of Portugal in various countries: Count of Torre Bela, José Anselmo Correia Henriques, João Francisco de Oliveira, Viscount of Nogueiras, Agostinho de Ornelas, Baron of São Pedro, João de Oliveira Sá Camelo Lampreia, and Jorge Santos. (See each of these names for more details).

Count of Torre Bela: Representative of Portugal in various countries
José Anselmo Correia Henriques: Representative of Portugal in various countries
João Francisco de Oliveira: Representative of Portugal in various countries
Viscount of Nogueiras: Representative of Portugal in various countries
Agostinho de Ornelas: Representative of Portugal in various countries
Baron of São Pedro: Representative of Portugal in various countries
João de Oliveira Sá Camelo Lampreia: Representative of Portugal in various countries
Jorge Santos: Representative of Portugal in various countries
